body:
### Description

I was going to file this in (Neovim)[https://github.com/neovim/neovim]'s repo, but `:LspRestart` is specifically only included with this package so I still thought putting this here was more appropriate? I can always move it if not.

When ever I run `:LspRestart` I get the following error, but then the LSP proceeds to restart anyways and it reattaches currently to the buffer.

This error doesn't appear to cause any issues other than an annoying error whenever it runs.

```
Error executing vim.schedule lua callback: C:/Program Files/Neovim/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:480: Error executing lua: vim/keymap.lua:119: E31: No such mapping
stack traceback:
	[C]: in function 'nvim_buf_del_keymap'
	vim/keymap.lua:119: in function 'del'
	C:/Program Files/Neovim/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:483: in function <C:/Program Files/Neovim/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:480>
	[C]: in function 'nvim_buf_call'
	C:/Program Files/Neovim/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:480: in function 'reset_defaults'
	C:/Program Files/Neovim/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:526: in function <C:/Program Files/Neovim/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:512>
stack traceback:
	[C]: in function 'nvim_buf_call'
	C:/Program Files/Neovim/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:480: in function 'reset_defaults'
	C:/Program Files/Neovim/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:526: in function <C:/Program Files/Neovim/share/nvim/runtime/lua/vim/lsp.lua:512>
```

### Neovim version (Nightly) (nvim -v)
NVIM v0.10.0-dev-2451+g8b4e26915

### OS
Windows 11

### Terminal
Windows Terminal
title: :LspRestart - `Error Executing vim.schedule`
